document.full_text: lindsey vonn took the lead from maria riesch in their duel for the overall world cup title on wednesday, finishing fourth behind winner julia mancuso in the final downhill of the season.
document.title: vonn takes overall lead; mancuso wins downhill
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn took the lead from maria riesch in their duel for the overall world cup title on wednesday, finishing fourth behind winner julia mancuso in the final downhill of the season.
